item.description:
• Version 3.0.2 (381):
    • The verification of Spice ressources during project loading is more forgiving.
    • HDF5 data exports are now comprehensive enough to allow to reload such data into Spectrum again.
    • Fixed a bug where the upper x axis in the Line Viewer didn't show the user's selected choice.
  • Version 3.0.1 (379):
    • Minor bug fixes.
  • Version 3.0.0 (378):
    • Polished UI
    • Impact database access
    • Better organisation scheme for datasets
    • Suports lastest version of SUDA instrument software
    • Improved code stability
